More Notes: Higher CO2 levels can result in large declines in vitamin content across all rice cultivars. Current year as year.
Percentage of global food system GHG emissions accounted for by agricultural activities and land-use change.
Percentage of global food system GHG emissions accounted for by food distribution supply chain activities (storage, processing, transport, etc.). Current year as year.
Percentage of total, global anthropogenic GHG emissions accounted for by food loss and waste. I am using 2013 as a representative year.
